title: An Act relative to the safety of courthouses and remote court proceedings

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Hunt of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1769) of Daniel J. Hunt relative to the safety of courthouses and remote court proceedings.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
